caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. STEPHEN C. TURNLEY AND EDWIN K. TAYLOR.

opinion.posture: In re State of Louisiana, through the Attorney General, William J. Guste, Jr., applying for writ of certiorari and review. Parish of LaSalle. Nos. 19,050 and 19,051.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Denied.
[2] MARCUS, J., would grant the writ.
